text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: DNS Resolution Issues>
We are investigating intermittent DNS resolution issues for some instances in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased API error rates in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: DNS Resolution Issues>
We have identified the cause of the DNS resolution issues for some instances in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region and continue working towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We are currently investigating increased error rates to Elastic Beanstalk APIs in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for invokes in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased API error rates in AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased error rates>
We are investigating increased API fault rates in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] DNS Resolution Issues>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PDT we experienced DNS resolution issues for some instances in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. Some AWS services experienced elevated error rates as a result of this issue. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] DNS Resolution Issues>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PDT we experienced DNS resolution issues for some instances in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. Some AWS services experienced elevated error rates as a result of this issue. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PST we experienced increased error rates in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased Error Rates>
We are currently investigating increased error rates for AWS IoT Core in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We have identified the root cause and are seeing recovery. We continue to work toward full resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PST we experienced increased error rates in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased error rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PST we experienced increased API fault rates and latencies in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:51 PM PST we experienced increased error rates in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:15 PM and 4:40 PM PST we experienced increased errors for connections to WorkSpaces in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:56 PM PST we experienced API and S3 connectivity failures in AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We have identified the root cause and are seeing recovery. We continue to work toward full resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
Between 3:19 PM and 4:43 PM PST we experienced increased error rates for API calls in the AP-NORTHEAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
